metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5253 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: NetHack before version 3.6.0 allowed malicious use of escaping of characters in the configuration file (usually .nethackrc) which could be exploited. This bug is patched in NetHack 3.6.0.

criterions.comment: nethack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
